entries.journal_entry_description: It would be wise to collect a few stimpacks before facing this difficult challenge. They can be found in the Medical Center. Look for them on top of desks in the center of the room.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: The Medical Center keeps medical kits around the center for emergencies. Go there and collect enough to have a full 5-change stimpack. You will need it.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Collect 5 Stimpacks from the Medical Center
